definition: variant of 毀|毁[hui3]/to destroy by fire/a blaze
to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander
variant of 毀|毁[hui3]/to defame/to slander

sentences.english: Mutilate, Backstab, Garrote and Ambush can no longer be dodged.
sentences.chinese: 毁伤，背刺，凿，伏击不再能被躲闪。

sentences.english: This paper gives a calculation model for the kill probability of anti-radiation missile warheads.
sentences.chinese: 提出反辐射导弹战斗部单发毁伤概率的计算模型。

sentences.english: The Rogue ability Mutilate now does its appropriate damage based on talents.
sentences.chinese: 盗贼技能毁伤现在造成基于天赋的相称伤害。

sentences.english: This is the second section about damage effectiveness analysis of aircraft carrier under the attacking of submunition.
sentences.chinese: 这是子母弹对航空母舰毁伤效果分析的第二部分。

sentences.english: Ammunition is the base of firepower blow and firepower damage.
sentences.chinese: 弹药是火力打击和火力毁伤的基础。

sentences.english: Slowly that really care for another often hurt myself.
sentences.chinese: 逐渐的才知道，太在意别人了常常会毁伤本人。

sentences.english: No amount of damage I don't care, wiped away tears tell yourself prohibit to cry.
sentences.chinese: 再多的毁伤我也不在意，擦干眼泪告诉本人不准哭。

sentences.english: The damage principle of water barrier against anti-ship missile is analyzed primarily.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对水障对反舰导弹的毁伤机理进行了初步分析。

sentences.english: This article is the third section to analysis effectiveness of the damage submunition against aircraft carrier.
sentences.chinese: 是子母弹对航空母舰毁伤效果分析的第三部分。

sentences.english: The results show that equivalence surrogate method for damage assessment is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，运用等效方法进行目标毁伤评估是可行的。

sentences.english: The measurement of explosion field temperature is an important aspect of the study on explosion heat radiation damage.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸场温度的测量是爆炸热毁伤效应的一项关键技术。

sentences.english: The damage probability of attacking warship with air-to-ship missile is studied using the method of simulation statistics.
sentences.chinese: 用统计模拟法研究了空对舰导弹对水面舰艇毁伤概率。

sentences.english: Dynamic wrist when amplitude should not be too big, lest damage.
sentences.chinese: 动腕时辐度不宜太大，以防毁伤。
